translation.en: He quickly moved into films, playing an artist in the star-studded ensemble drama Ship of Fools and a scheming, wily American corporal in a World War Two prisoner-of-war camp in King Rat in 1965.
translation.tn: O ne a tsena ka bonako mo go tsa difilimi, a tshameka jaaka modiragatsi mo terameng ya Ship of Fools le lenweenwee le le setlhogo la kwa Amerika, kwa kampeng ya ntwa ya Lefatshe ya bobedi mo King Rat ka 1965.

translation.en: Two years later he earned an Academy Award nomination as best supporting actor in the harrowing, marital drama Who’s Afraid of Virginia Woolf? with Burton and Elizabeth Taylor.
translation.tn: Morago ga dingwaga tse pedi o amogetse tlhopho ya dikabelo tsa Akatemi jaaka modirigatsi yo o tshegetsang yo o gaisang mo terameng ya lenyalo “Who’s afraid of Virginia woolf”? le Burton le Elizabeth Taylor.

translation.en: As cheering children and men frantically paddle their inflatable surfboard through the frothy Pacific waves onto the beach, one passenger placidly sits in the bow taking it all in a large, white goat.
translation.tn: Fa bana ba ba itumetseng le banna ba palama diboto tsa bona tsa go thuma tse di budulwang, ba tshamekela mo makhubung a metsi kwa lewatleng, mopalami a le mongwe o dutse kwa thoko mme o lebeleletse, podi e tshweu

translation.en: California surfer Dana McGregor has always loved the thrill of catching a wave, but it wasn’t until he took his pet goat surfing with him one day that he truly found his calling.
translation.tn: Mothumi wa kwa California Dana McGregor, kgale e le motho yo o ratang go thuma mo makhubu a lewatle, fela o fitlheletse pitso ya gagwe ya nnete fa ne a tsamaile le podi ya gagwe go ya go thuma kwa lewatleng ka letsatsi lengwe.

translation.en: I got one goat to clear my poison oak in the backyard
translation.tn: Ke tsere podi e le nngwe go tlosa botlhole jwa setlhare sa ouku mo jarateng ya me.

translation.en: I decided to take it surfing on my birthday
translation.tn: Ke tsere tshwetso ya go e isa kwa lewatleng  go ya go thuma ka letsatsi la me la matsalo.

translation.en: and then I just ended up surfing goats, recalled McGregor of the day his goat-surfing journey began almost ten years ago.
translation.tn: Mme ke ne ka feleletsa ke thuma le dipodi, go gakologelwa McGregor ka ga letsatsi le leeto la gagwe la go thuma mo makhubung le dipodi le simolotseng ka lona, dingwaga tse di lesome tse di fetileng.

translation.en: McGregor, 42, now teaches children how to surf from Pismo Beach, north of Santa Barbara, using his pet goats Pismo and Grover to help them overcome their fear of the water.
translation.tn: McGregor wa dingwaga di le 42, jaanong o ruta bana go thuma go tswa kwa lewatleng la Pismo, kwa bokone jwa SANTA Barbara, ka go dirisa dipodi tsa gagwe, Pismo le Grover go ba thusa go kgona go fenya letshogo ya metsi.

translation.en: When its your first time it feels scary but actually after you keep on doing it and doing it, its really fun, said 10-year-old Mileah Robbins, fresh from riding a wave with eight-year-old Pismo.
translation.tn: Fa e le lekgetlho la ntlha, go a tshosa mme fa o tswelela go e dira nako le nako, e monate, go bua Mileah Robbins wa dingwaga di le 10, e le gona a tswang mo lekhubung la metsi le Pismo wa dingwaga di le robedi.

translation.en: The goats seem to enjoy it too, judging by Pismos relaxed expression as he hit the waves.
translation.tn: Go lebega e kete dipodi le tsona di a e rata, ke lebile ka mokgwa o  Pismo a iketlileng ka teng fa a tsena mo makhubung a metsi.

translation.en: There’s a freedom in surfing that you can’t find just anywhere, said McGregor, hugging his goats as they stand on the boardwalk, attracting attention from children and other passers-by.
translation.tn: Go na le kgololosego mo go thumeng mo makhubung e o sekakeng wa e bona gongwe le gongwe fela, go bua McGregor, a atla dipodi tsa gagwe fa di eme mo tselaneng,, di ngoka bana le bafeti ka tsela.

translation.en: You’re riding waves that God brings us, that bring healing and joy and freedom and peace into our lives so I want everyone to experience that.
translation.tn: O thuma mo makhubung a Modimo a re tlisetsang ona, a a tlisang pholo, boitumelo, kgololosego le kagiso mo matshelong a rona ka jalo, ke batla gore mongwe le mongwe a itemogele seo.

translation.en: The battle of Cuito Cuanavale has paved the way for the liberation of Southern Africa.
translation.tn: Ntwa ya ga Cuito Cuanavale  tlhagotse tsela ya kgololesego ya Borwa jwa Aforika.

translation.en: This is according to Arts, Sport and Culture Minister, Nathi Mthethwa.
translation.tn: Seno ke go ya ka Tona ya Botsweretshi, metshameko le setso, Nathi Mthethwa.

translation.en: Mthethwa was speaking at the commemoration of the battle at Freedom Park in Pretoria on Tuesday.
translation.tn: Mthethwa ne a bua kwa segopotsong sa ntwa kwa Freedom Park kwa Pretoria ka Labobedi.

translation.en: The battle expedited the liberation of Namibia, South Africa and the SADC region.
translation.tn: Ntwa e, e itlhaganedisitse kgololosego ya Namibia, Aforikaborwa le kgaolo ya SADC.

translation.en: The battle of Cuito Cuanavale was fought on the banks of the Lomba River in Cuito Cuanavale, South-Eastern Angola.
translation.tn: Ntwa ya Cuito Cuanavale e ne e lwanwa mo dintshing tsa noka ya  Lomba kwa Cuito Cuanavale, kwa borwa botlhaba jwa  Angola.

translation.en: It involved the late Jonas Savimbi-led rebel group, UNITA, assisted by the South African Defence Force against the Angolan army (FAPLA), who was assisted by Cuba, the Soviet Union and to a lesser extent East Germany.
translation.tn: E ne akaretsa setlhopha sa marabele sa ga moswi Jonas Savimbi  UNITA, ba thusiwa ke sesole sa Aforikaborwa kgatlhanong le Sesole sa kwa Angola (FAPLA), se se neng se thusiwa ke Cuba, Soviet Union le go le gonnye, botlhaba jwa Jeremane.

translation.en: Eduardo Kondua, representing Angolan Ambassador to South Africa says the outcomes of the battle of Cuito Cuanavale were important for the SADC region.
translation.tn: Eduardo Kondua, yo o emetseng  moambasadara wa Angolo kwa Aforikaborwa re ditlamorago tsa ntwa ya Cuito Cuanavale di ne di le botlhokwa mo kgaolong ya SADC.

translation.en: Indeed the results of Cuito Cuanavale campaign were crucial in persuading the leaders of South Africa’s national party to cut their losses.
translation.tn: Tota dipholo tsa letsholo la Cuito Cuanavale di ne di le botlhokwa thata mo go tlhotlheletseng baeteledipele ba lekoko la bosetšhaba la Aforikaborwa go tswa mo go yona ba ise ba latlhegelwe.

translation.en: They did so following talks with the Angolan government, Soviet Union, Cuba, Britain and the United States leading to a major strategic realignment with huge consequences for the whole Southern African region.
translation.tn: Ba ne ba dira jalo morago ga go buisana le puso ya kwa Angola, Soviet Union, Cuba, Britain le Unites States, go tlisa thulaganyo ya paakanyo e e nang le ditlamorago tse di boitshegang mo kgaolong ya Borwa jwa Aforika.

translation.en: Many people died on all fronts involved in the battle.
translation.tn: Batho ba le bantsi ba tlhokafetseng mo matlhakoreng otlhe ka go nna le seabe mo ntweng.

translation.en: South West African Peoples Organisation lost an estimated 11 400 guerrillas in combat.
translation.tn: Mokgatlho batho wa Borwa Bophirima jwa Aforika o  latlhegetswe ke bokana ka 11 400 jwa barukhutlhi kwa ntweng.

translation.en: Deputy Head of Mission at the Embassy of Namibia Vasco Samupofu ensured that Namibia acquired independence.
translation.tn: Motlatsa tlhogo ya boromiwa kwa embasing ya Namibia Vasco Samupofu o tlhomamisitse gore Namibia e bona kgololosego.

translation.en: The battle of Cuito Cuanavale culminated into Namibia getting its independence the last colony in Africa through the implementation of the United Nations Security Council resolution which led to Namibias independence on 21 March 1990.
translation.tn: Ntwa ya Cuito Cuanavale e dirile gore Namibia e bone kgololosego ya yona, koloni ya bofelo mo Aforika, ka go tsenngwa tirisong ga tshwetso ya Khansele ya Tshireletso ya Ditšhabakopano tse di dirileng gore Namibia e kgone go ikemela ka nosi ka di 21 Mopitlwe 1990.

translation.en: It put a final nail also in the coffin of apartheid South Africa leading to its demise and democratisation of South Africa in 1994, whereby ending the destabilisation of the region by the racist regime then.
translation.tn: E okeditse mathata a tlhaolele mo Aforikaborwa mme se se bakile go wa ga yona le go tlisa temokerasi mo Aforikaborwa ka 1994, fa go fedisiwaa go sa tsepama ga kgaolo ka puso ya bosemorafe ya nako eo.

translation.en: The wreath-laying ceremony at the Commemoration of Cuito Cuanavale at @Freedom Park in Pretoria.
translation.tn: Moletlo wa peo ya dikgare kwa segopotsong sa Cuito Cuanavale kwa Freedom Park kwa Pretoria.

translation.en: The Battle of Cuito Cuanavale was the climax of the war that took place in Angola instigated by the apartheid regime, in 1987-1988, where the apartheid regime was defeated.
translation.tn: Ntwa ya Cuito Cuanavale e ne e le setlhoa sa ntwa e e neng ya tshwarelwa kwa Angola e e simolotsweng ke puso ya tlhaolele, ka 1987-1988, fa puso ya tlhaolele e fentsweng kwa teng.

translation.en: Cuban casualties in Angola totalled approximately 10 000 dead.
translation.tn: Palogotlhe ya batho ba ka nna 10 000 ba kwa Cuba ba tlhokafetse kwa Angola.

translation.en: The number included deaths, injuries and those missing.
translation.tn: Palo e akareditse dintsho, dikgobalo le ba ba latlhegileng.

translation.en: Ambassador of Cuba Rodolfo Benitez says the outcomes of the battle changed the balance of power in the region.
translation.tn: Moambasadara wa Cuba Rodolfo Benitez a re ditlamorago tsa ntwa di fetotse  tekatekano ya maatla mo kgaolong.

translation.en: The defeat of the racist South African army in Angola fundamentally changed the regional balance of power.
translation.tn: Go fenngwa ga masole a bosemorafe a Aforikaborwa kwa Angola, go fetotse tekatekano ya maatla thata.

translation.en: It forced the apartheid regime to the negotiation table with the ANC, with Angola and with Cuba and to make concessions that they have been rejecting for many years.
translation.tn: E pateleditse puso ya tlhaolele go ya go nna le dipuisano le ANC, le Angola le Cuba le go dira gore ditumalano tse ba ntseng ba gana go dira mo dingwageng tse dintsi.

translation.en: As Mandela said, Cuito was crucial in bringing Pretoria to realise it would have to talk with us.
translation.tn: Jaaka fa Mandela a buile, Cuito e ne e le botlhokwa mo go direng gore Pretoria e lemoge gore ba tshwanetse go bua le rona.

translation.en: In the region, it was referred to as frontline states. Now SADC, says Mthethwa.
translation.tn: Mo kgaolong e, e ne e itsege jaaka dinaga tsa boelamotlhaje.

translation.en: Mthethwa announced that together with his Angolan counterpart they will be asking the African Union member states to recognise the role that the battle of Cuito Cuanavale played in the history of the continent.
translation.tn: Mthethwa  begile gore mmogo le ba kwa Angola, ba tlaa ya go kopa Kopano ya Aforika  go lemoga seabe se ntwa ya Cuito Cuanavale e nnileng le soma mo hisetoring ya kontinente.

translation.en: Battle of Cuito Cuanavale commemoration.
translation.tn: Segopotso sa ntwa ya Cuito Cuanavale.

translation.en: In a room crammed from ceiling to floor with boxes, cabinets and drawers of Lego bricks, Hoang Dang intently builds a bright blue, yellow and red fishing boat with a Vietnamese flag and eyes at its prow.
translation.tn: Mo phaposing e e tletseng ka mabokoso, dikhabinete ke dilae tsa ditena tsa Lego, go tswa kwa marulelong go fitlha fa fatshe, Hoang Dang o ikaelela go aga mokoro wa go thaya ditlhapi wa mmala wa botala jwa legaodimo, o o serolwana le o  mohibidu, o o nang le folaga wa kwa Vietnam le matlho kwa nkong ya mokoro.

translation.en: The industrial designer has loved Lego for as long as he can remember, but started collecting it seriously a few years ago on an overseas study trip to Detroit, amazed by the range of sets available in the United States.
translation.tn: Moenjenere yo fa e sale go tloga kgale a rata Lego, mme o simolotse go e tsaya tsia dingwaga di le mmalwa tse di fetileng fa ba tsere loeto lwa go ya kwa moseja kwa Detroit, a gakgamaditswe ke disete tse dintsi tse di leng teng kwa United States.

translation.en: Hoang is most inspired by scenes close to home in Vietnam, painstakingly recreating his childhood house, a temple in Hanois Old Quarter and a 1990s living room during Lunar New Year, all in intricate and colourful miniature detail.
translation.tn: Hoang yo gantsi a rotloediwang  ke ditiragalo gaufi le legae la gagwe kwa Vietnam, a aga sešwa ntlo e a goletseng mo go yona, kereke kwa dikotareng tsa bogologolo kwa Hanois, le lefelo la boiketlo la dingwaga tsa bo 1990 ka nako ya ngwaga o mošwa wa Lunar, tsotlhe tse ka dintlha tse di kgatlhisang tse di matswakabele.

translation.en: I want to bring my perspective to friends all over the world, because Vietnams Lego building community is still little known regionally and globally, he said.
translation.tn: Ke batla go isa kakanyo ya me go ditsala tsa me mo lefatsheng ka bophara, ka gonne baagi ba Lego ba Vietnam ba santse ba itsege mo kgaolong le mo lefatsheng ka bophara, a rialo.

translation.en: Hoang is halfway to his goal of building 10 large-scale creations for an exhibition.
translation.tn: Hoang o gaufi le go fetsa go  bopa ditshwantsho tse dikgolo tse 10, tse di tlaa bontshiwang kwa pontshong.

translation.en: It takes about five months to finish a 5,000-piece facade, he said, although much of that time is spent finding the right pieces.
translation.tn: Go ka tsaya dikgwedi di le tlhano go fetsa maribelo a dipapetlana di le 5,000, a rialo, le fa bontsi jwa nako eo bo dirisetswa go bona dipapetlana tse di nepagetseng.

translation.en: I often spend a whole evening to look for just that one brick, he added.
translation.tn: Go le gantsi nna bosigo jotlhe ke go batlana fela le setene se le sengwe, a tlaleletsa.

translation.en: Despite a collection of over two million Lego bricks, Hoang is always on the hunt for new pieces.
translation.tn: Le mororo a kgobokantse ditena tsa Lego tse di fetang dimilione  di le pedi, Hoang o dula ka gale a  tsomana le ditena tse dintšhwa.

translation.en: That’s how he made what he calls his Lego friends, including Khang Huynh in Ho Chi Minh City.
translation.tn: Ke tsela e ka yona a dirileng se a se bitsang ditsala tsa Lego, go akaretsa Khang Huynh kwa toropong ya Ho Chi Minhn.

translation.en: The pair met on a Facebook group for Lego builders and collectors.
translation.tn: Bobedi jo bo kopane mo setlhopheng sa Facebook sa baagi le bakokoanyi ba Lego.

translation.en: The name Lego is an abbreviation of leg godt meaning play well in Danish.
translation.tn: Leina la Lego ke khutshwafatso ya “leg godt” e e rayana gore “tshamega sentle” ka se Danish.

translation.en: Building Lego helps us to recharge our creative energy after working on long and tiring projects, said Hoang.
translation.tn: Go aga Lego go re thusa go tsosolosa maatla a rona morago ga go dira ka natla mo diporojekeng tse di lapisang, Hoang o buile jalo.

translation.en: They like to photograph what inspires them on the street, then recreate it with bricks.
translation.tn: Ba rata tsaya ditshwantsho tsa dilo tse di ba tlhotlheletsang mo mmileng, mme ba bo ba di bopa ka ditena.

translation.en: For Khang, that includes street scenes with complex builds like a classic Honda Cub motorcycle.
translation.tn: Mo go Khang, se se akaretsa ditiragalo tsa mo mmileng, go akaretsa le go bopa dilo tse di  tshwanang le sekuta sa Honda Cub.

translation.en: I am drawn to the everyday things around me that are very familiar, said Khang.
translation.tn: Ke kgatlhiwa ke dilo tsa letsatsi le letsatsi tse di ntikaganyeditseng, go bua Khang.

translation.en: I build anything that I feel is cute and dear to me.
translation.tn: Ke aga sengwe le sengwe se ke bonang se le sentle e bile ke se rata.

translation.en: Twitter boss Jack Dorsey sold his first tweet as an NFT for just over $2.9 million dollars on Monday.
translation.tn: Motsaisi wa Twitter Jack Dorsey o rekisitswe tweet ga gawe ya ntlha  jaaka NFT ka dimilione tsa didolara tsa Amerika tse di fetang $2.9 ka Mosupologo.

translation.en: The tweet is in the form of a non-fungible token (NFT)  a kind of unique digital asset that has exploded in popularity so far in 2021.
translation.tn: Tweet e, e ka sebopego sa non-fungible token (NFT), e e leng thoto ya digithale e e kgethegileng, e e simolotseng go tuma go tla go fitlha jaanong ka 2021.

translation.en: Each NFT has its own blockchain-based digital signature, which serves as a public ledger, allowing anyone to verify the assets authenticity and ownership.
translation.tn: NFT e nngwe le e nngwe e na le mosaeno wa yona wa dijithale o o dirang jaaka bukana ya setšhaba, e e letlang mongwe le mongwe go netefatsa bonnete jwa dithoto le gore ke tsa ga mang.

translation.en: The NFT was sold via auction on a platform called Valuables, which is owned by the U.S.-based company Cent.
translation.tn: NFT e rekisitswe kwa fantising mo thulaganyong e e bidiwang “Valuables”, e e tshwerweng ke setlamo sa kwa US, Cent.

translation.en: It was bought using the cryptocurrency Ether, for 1630.5825601 ETH, which was worth $2,915,835.47 at the time of sale, Cameron Hejazi, the CEO and co-founder of Cent confirmed.
translation.tn: E rekilwe ka go dirisa cryptocurrency Ether, 1630.5825601 ETH, e boleng jwa yona e neng e le $2,915,835.47 ka nako ya thekiso, Cameron Hejazi, CEO le mothei-mmogo wa Cent o netefaditse.

translation.en: Cent confirmed the buyer is Sina Estavi.
translation.tn: Cent e tlhomamisitse gore moreki ke Sina Estavi.

translation.en: Estavi’s Twitter profile, @sinaEstavi, says he is based in Malaysia and is CEO of the blockchain company Bridge Oracle.
translation.tn: Aterese ya ga Estavi ya Twitter, e bontsha gore o dula kwa Malaysia le gore ke moeteledipele wa setlamo sa Bridge Oracle.

translation.en: Estavi told Reuters he was thankful when asked for comment about the purchase.
translation.tn: Estavi o boleletse Reuters gore o tletse ditebogo fa a ne a kopiwa go tshwaela ka theko ya gagwe.

translation.en: On March 6, Dorsey, who is a bitcoin enthusiast, tweeted a link to the website where the NFT was listed for sale.
translation.tn: Ka di 6 Mopitlwe, Dorsey, yo e leng morati wa bitcoin, o kwadile linki ya webosaete e NFT e neng e rekisiwa mo go yona.

translation.en: He then said in another tweet on March 9 that he would convert the proceeds from the auction into bitcoin and donate them to people impacted by COVID-19 in Africa.
translation.tn: O buile gape mo tweet ya gagwe ka di 9 Mopitlwe  gore ena o ne a ka fetola madi go tswa kwa fantising go a dira di bitcoin le go a abela batho ba ba amilweng ke COVID-19 kwa Aforika.

translation.en: Dorsey receives 95% of the proceeds of the primary sale, while Cent receives 5%.
translation.tn: Dorsey o amogela 95% ya madi a thekiso, fa Cent yona e a amogela 5%.

translation.en: Cent CEO Cameron Hejazi said that his platform allows people to show support for a tweet that goes beyond the current options to like, comment and retweet.
translation.tn: Motsaisi wa Cent, Cameron Hejazi o rile polatefomo ya gagwe e letla batho go tshegetsa tweet e e dirang go feta diitlhophelo  m tse di leng teng ga jaana tse di tshwanang le go rata, go tshwaela,  le go fetisa tweet.

translation.en: These assets might go up in value, they might go down in value, but what will stay is the ledger and the history of I purchased this from you at this moment in time and thats going to be in both the buyer, the seller and the public spectators memory, Hejazi said, adding that this was inherently valuable.
translation.tn: Boleng jwa dithoto tse bo ka ya kwa godimo, bo ka ya kwa tlase, mme se se tla nnang se le teng ke bukana le hisetori ya gore ke rekile se mo go wena, ka nako e, mme seo se tlile go dula mo megopolong ya moreki, morekisi le babogedi ba setšhaba Hejazi o buile jalo, a oketsa ka gore se se na le boleng jo bo ka fetisetswang kwa go ba ba tlang.

translation.en: Prague city hall has rented a luxury hotel where homeless people who contract COVID-19 can convalesce and those who come into contact with someone with the disease can isolate.
translation.tn: Holo ya toropo ya Prague e hirile hotele ya manobonobo kwa batho ba ba tlhokang magae, ba ba tsenwang ke mogare wa COVID-19 ba ka nnang teng go fitlha ba fola, le gore ba ba tlaa kopanang le mongwe yo o nang le bolwetse ba kgone bo beelwa kwa thoko.

translation.en: The city’s Centre of Social Services (CSSP) deputy director Ludmila Tomesova said those housed in the hotel were offered three meals a day, full medical attention and television and other amenities while they recovered.
translation.tn: Motlatsa mokaedi wa senthara ya ditirelo tsa loago ya toropo (CSSP) Ludmila Tomesova  O rile batho ba ba bolokilweng kwa hoteleng eo, ba ne fa fiwa dijo ga raro ka letsatsi, tlhokomelo e e tletseng ya kalafi le thelebišhene le tse dingwe tse di tlhokegang fa ba ntse ba kokotlegela.

translation.en: So the hotel  has guests, even if they are not standard commercial ones, and it is full all the time, she told Reuters at a four-star Prague hotel in the city centre that has housed about 250 people since November.
translation.tn: Ka jalo, hotele e na le baeng, le fa e se ba ba tlwaelegileng mme e dula e tletse ka dinako tsotlhe, boleletse Reuters kwa hoteleng ya Prague e e mo toropong Hotele mo toropong e e nnang batho ba le 250 go tloga ka kgwedi ya Ngwanatsele.

translation.en: The Czech Republic has been among the hardest-hit countries in the world during the recent wave of the pandemic.
translation.tn: Czech Republic e nnile nngwe ya dinaga tse di gobetseng le feta mo lefatsheng ka nako ya lekhubu la sešweng la leroborobo.

translation.en: Deaths from the virus have reached nearly 25 000 in the country of 10.7 million people.
translation.tn: Dintsho tse di bakilweng ke mogare di fitlhile go 25 000 mo nageng ya batho ba le dimilione di le 10.7.

translation.en: The per-capita infection rate was the third-highest in the world in the past week, according to the Our World in Data website.
translation.tn: Seelo sa tshwaetso ya motho ka mongwe se ne se le mo maemong a boraro kwa godimo mo lefatsheng mo bekeng e e fetileng, go ya ka webosaete ya Our World in Data.

translation.en: Tomesova said Prague, which has about 4 500 homeless people, was trying to help people find shelter and get access to other services once they tested negative and left the hotels.
translation.tn: Tomesova o rile Prague, e e ka nnang le batho ba ba senang magae ba le 4 500, e ne e leka go thusa batho go bona tshireletso le go nna le phitlhelelo ya ditirelo tse dingwe, fa diteko tsa bona di bontsha ba sa tlhole ba na le mogare, ba tlaa tswa kwa hoteleng.

translation.en: For some guests, the stay was a rare taste of luxury.
translation.tn: Mo go ba bangwe, go dula koo e ne maitemogela a bas a a tlwaeleang, a manobonobo.

translation.en: Its the first time in my life that Ive been in a hotel like this, Josef Jirsa said, as he recovered from a mild case of COVID-19.
translation.tn: Ke lwa ntlha mo botshelong jwa ke nna mo hoteleng e e tshwanang le e, go bua Josef Jirsa, jaaka a ne a le mo tseleng ya go alafega bolwetse jwa COVID-19

translation.en: The Northern Cape multi-award-winning Amandla Dance Teatro artists are back on stage for the first time since the relaxation of the COVID-19 restrictions with a new musical, Mwana Wa Mvula.
translation.tn: Batshweretshi ba ba ikgapetseng dikgele di le dintsi ba setlhopha sa motanso sa Amandla kwa Kapa Bokone, ba boetse mo seraleng lwa ntlha fa go fokodiwa ga melawana ya COVID-19 ka tiragatso ya bona ya mmino Mwana Wa Mvula.

translation.en: The cast is happy and excited to be back on stage.
translation.tn: Setlhopha se se itumetse thata gore se se boetse mo seraleng.

translation.en: And despite the financial strain they are experiencing due to COVID-19, the first show was free for children.
translation.tn: Le fa ba na le kgatelelo ya madi e ba itemogelang yona ka ntlha ya COVID-19, Bana ba ne ba le letlelesegile go tsena kwa ntle ga tuelo kwa tiragatsong ya bona ya ntlha.

translation.en: We are struggling.
translation.tn: Re a sotlega.

translation.en: The struggling economy, its COVID and the industry has been hit very hard.
translation.tn: Mathata a ikonomi, ke COVID mme intaseteri gobetse go feta tekanyo.

translation.en: Its been a big problem but all in all, we had to make this free for the kids, says Amandla Dance Teatro co-director, Mkhululi Mabija.
translation.tn: E ntse e le bothata jo bo bogolo, mme le fa go ntse jalo, re ne ra tshwanelwa ke go dira se kwa ntle ga go duedisa bana, go bua motlatsa motsamaisi wa setlhopha sa motantsho teatro Mkhululi Mabija.

translation.en: Artists say despite the financial challenges they are facing, they are driven by their passion for the arts.
translation.tn: Batsweretshi ba re le fa ba lebagane le dikgwetlho tsa matlole, ba rotloetswa ke phisego e ba nang le yona ya botsweretshi jwa bona.

translation.en: The musical storyline depicts a journey of a rainmaker, Lerumo, whose spiritual gift clashes with his father’s Christian beliefs.
translation.tn: Kgangkgolo ya tirigatso e ya mmino, e bontsha loeto la monesapula, Lerumo, yo mpho ya gagwe ya semowa e thulanang le ditumelo tsa sekeresete.

translation.en: My character in the play; I’m a other fighting for the rights of women and the rights of our children, says actress, Kediemetse Oliphant.
translation.tn: Karolo ya me mo motshamekong; ke lwela ditshwanelo tsa basadi le ditshwanelo tsa bana ba rona, go bua modiragatsi Kediemetse Oliphant.

translation.en: Actor Duncan Matloko says: The story is more about me being born and then the father denies the family gift.
translation.tn: Modiragatsi Duncan Matloko a re: Kgang e, e ka ga go tsalwa ga me, mme rre a be a gana go amogela mpho ya mo lelapeng.

translation.en: The message is that when you are a father of a gifted child, don’t be jealous.
translation.tn: Molaetsa ke gore, fa o le rre wa ngwana yo o nang le neo, o seka wa nna le mona.

translation.en: You must always be there for your child, adds Obakeng Moapesi, another actor.
translation.tn: O tshwanetse go dula o le teng fa ngwana wa gago a go tlhoka, go tlaleletsa Obakeng Moapesi. modiragatsi yo mongwe.

translation.en: The Mwana Wa Vula Musical will go on until the end of April.
translation.tn: Tiragatso ya mmino ya Mwana Wa Vula e tla tswelela go fitlha kwa bokhutlong jwa Moranang.

translation.en: Modern African music is altering perceptions of the continent as part of a global cultural shift that marks a big moment, Nigerian music artist Burna Boy told Reuters after hailing his first Grammy award.
translation.tn: Mmino wa Aforika wa segompieno o fetela megopolo ya kontinente jaaka e le karolo ya setso e ne tshwayang motsotso o mogolo, Motsweretshi wa mmino wa kwa Nigeria Burna Boy o ne a bolelela Reuters morago ga go amogela Grammy lwantlha.

translation.en: Burna Boy was awarded a Grammy for the Best Global Music Album this month for Twice As Tall which was released last year.
translation.tn: Burna Boy o ne a newa Grammy ya alebamo ya mmino e e gaisang lefatshe ka bophara mo kgweding e, ya “Twice as Tall” e e golotsweng mo ngwageng o o fetileng.

translation.en: He is part of a generation of Nigerian music artists, which include Wizkid and Davido, that has enjoyed global success in recent years as proponents of the Afrobeats sound.
translation.tn: Ke mongwe wa batsweretshi ba mmino wa kwa Nigeria, ba ba akaretsang Wizkid le Davido, ba ba neng ya atlega mo dingwageng tse di fetileng jaaka batshegetsi ba mmino wa Afrobeats.

translation.en: The African genre is now almost as likely to be heard in London or Los Angeles as it is in Lagos.
translation.tn: Mofuta o wa mmino wa Aforika jaanong o reediwa kwa London kgotsa Los Angeles jaaka go dirwa kwa Lagos.

translation.en: Its a big moment and a big time for African music and Africans in general, said Burna Boy, during an interview at his home in Nigerias commercial capital Lagos.
translation.tn: Ke motsotso o mogolo le nako e kgolo ya mmino wa Aforika le Maaforika ka kakaretso, go bua BurnaBoy, ka nako ya potsolotso kwa legaeng la gagwe kwa toropokgolo ya Nigeria Lagos.

translation.en: The artist, whose real name is Damini Ogulu, said his award was part of a domino effect that gives Africans more control over the way they are perceived through technology, as streaming services take the continents arts to a global audience.
translation.tn: Motaki yo leina la gagwe la nnete e leng Damini Ogulu, o rile kabelo ya gagwe e ne e le karolo ya sengwe se se nayang Maaforika taolo e e kwa godimo ka tsela e  ba tsewang ka yona mo go tsa thekenoloji, jaaka ditirelo tsa inthanete di isa botsweretshi kwa kontiente go bareetsi gotlhe.

translation.en: I didn’t even want to be African when I was little, he said.
translation.tn: Ke ne ke sa batle go nna MoAforika fa ke ne ke le monnye. A rialo.

translation.en: I wanted to be anything but who I was, because who we are wasnt really the cool thing to be, said the artist, who grew up in southern Nigeria and moved to London as a child before returning to the west African country.
translation.tn: Ke ne ke batla go nna sengwe le sengwe kwa ntle ga se ke neng ke le sona ka ntlha ya gore, se re le sona, e ne se sengwe se se tsewang tsia ka nako eo. Go bua motsweretshi yo o goletseng kwa Borwa jwa Nigeria mme a fudugela kwa London fa e ne e le ngwana pele ga a boela kwa nageng ya bophirima jwa Aforika.

translation.en: He said his win showed that African music was attracting worldwide respect.
translation.tn: A re phenyo ya gagwe e bontshitse gore mmino wa Aforika o ngoka mo lefatsheng ka bophara.

translation.en: Those sentiments were shared by many at Edge Music Academy, in the Jakande district of Lagos, where students compose music in a studio decked out with microphones, laptops and a keyboard.
translation.tn: Bontsi jwa batho ba ba neng ba le kwa Akatemi ya mmino ya Edge, kwa kgaolong ya Jakande kwa Lagos, kwa baithuti ba tlhamang mmino mo setudiong se se tletseng dimaekerofouno,  dilepothopo le di khiiboto le bona ba ne ba ikutlwa fela jaaka ena.

translation.en: The future is bright, said student Obi Prince.
translation.tn: Ke isagwe e e phatsimang, go bua  moithuti, Obi Prince.

translation.en: The way Afrobeats is represented in the world right now can only be a start for Nigerian artists.
translation.tn: Tsela e Afrobeats e emetsweng ka yona mo lefatsheng lotlhe ga jaanong jaana, e ka tswa e le tshimologo go batsweretshi ba kwa Nigeria.

translation.en: We just have to do our thing and bring out ourselves more globally, he said.
translation.tn: Re tshwanetse go dira se re tumileng ka sona le go itshupa mo lefatsheng ka bophara, a rialo.

translation.en: The academys chief executive officer, Michael Tijani, said Burna Boys win was a huge deal for Nigerian music.
translation.tn: Motsamaisimogolo wa akatemo, Michael Tijani, a re phenyo ya ga Burna Boy e na le kamego e kgolo mo mminong wa kwa Nigeria.

translation.en: People coming into the industry now have a more concrete belief that you can actually get as far as anybody else in the world can go, he said.
translation.tn: Batho ba ba tsenang mo intasetering jaanong ba na le tumelo e e tletseng ya gore le wena o ka fitlhelela tse di fitlhelelwang ke ba bangwe mo lefatsheng. a rialo.

translation.en: Reclining in a chair in his home studio, Burna Boy reflected on his success.
translation.tn: A iketlile mo setulong kwa setudiong sa gagwe sa kwa gae, Burna Boy o akanya ka katlego ya gagwe.

translation.en: You can’t mention the top five musicians in the world without throwing me or an African in there, he said, smiling.
translation.tn: O ka se ke wa umaka diopedi tse tlhano tse di kwa godimo mo lefatsheng kwa ntle ga go latlhela leina la me kgotsa MoAforika mo teng, a rialo ka monyebo.

translation.en: Now were eye to eye with the people we used to look up to.
translation.tn: Jaanong re mo maemong a le osi le batho ba re neng re tsaya malebela mo go bona.

translation.en: Facebook Inc said on Monday it took down 1.3 billion fake accounts between October and December and that it had over 35 000 people working on tackling misinformation on its platform.
translation.tn: Facebook Inc rile ka Mosupologo e tlositse diakhaonto tsa mokokotelo di le dimilione di le 1.3 magareng ga Diphalane le Sedimonthole le gore e na le batho ba le 35 000 ba ba tshwaraganeng le tshedimosetso e e fosagetseng mo polatefomong ya yona.

translation.en: The company also removed more than 12 million pieces of content about COVID-19 and vaccines that global health experts flagged as misinformation, it said in a blog post.
translation.tn: Setlamo se gape se tlositse dintlha tsa tshedimosetso di le dimilione di le 12, tse di ka ga COVID-19 le meento e baitseanape ba boitekanelo ba kaileng e le tshedimosetso e e fosagetseng, e buile jalo mo bolokhong.

translation.en: False claims and conspiracies about the coronavirus vaccines have proliferated on social media platforms including Facebook and Twitter during the pandemic.
translation.tn: Tshedimosetso e e senang boammaruri ka ga meento ya mogare wa corona le meento e ne e tlalatladitswe mo dipolatefomong tsa mmedia tse di akaretsang Facebook le Twitter ka nako ya lerobororo.

translation.en: Facebooks disclosure of data on misinformation comes ahead of an inspection by the US House Committee on Energy and Commerce into how technology platforms including Facebook are tackling misinformation.
translation.tn: Molao wa Facebook wa go senolwa ga tshedimosetso e e senang boammaruri o tla pele ga tlhatlhobo ka komiti ya US House ka ga tsela e ka yona dipolatefomo tsa thekenoloji go akaretsa le Facebook di mekamekanang le tshedimosetso e e senang boammaruri.

translation.en: Robot artist Sophia, whose first artwork goes up for auction on Wednesday, says she draws inspiration for her work from people and is open to future creative partnerships with humans.
translation.tn: Motsweretshi wa diroboto Sophia, yo tiro ya gagwe ya ntlha ya botaki e yang kwa fantising ka Laboraro, a re o bona thotloetso ya tiro ya gagwe go tswa kwa bathong, mme a ka rata go  didirisa mmogo le batho mo nakong e e tlang.

translation.en: A digital artwork by the Hong Kong-based Hanson Robotics humanoid, in the form of a Non-Fungible Token (NFT), is to be auctioned in the first sale of such pieces created jointly with artificial intelligence (AI).
translation.tn: Tiro ya botaki ya dijithale ya  Hanson Robotics Humanoid, e e tlang ka mokgwa wa non-fungible token (NFT), e tlaa rekisiwa kwa fantising mo thenkong ya ntlha ya go nna jalo e dirwa ka kopanelo le tsa matlhale a maitirelo (AI).

translation.en: NFTs, a digital signature saved on blockchain ledgers that allows anyone to verify the ownership and authenticity of items, have become the latest investment craze, with one artwork selling this month for nearly $70 million.
translation.tn: NFT, Tshaeno ya dijithale e e bolokilweng mo dibukaneng tsa mafaratlhatlha, e e letlang motho mongwe le mongwe go netefatsa gore mong wa yona ke mang le boammaaruri jwa yona, e simolotse go nna peeletso e go buiwang ka yona thata,  nngwe ya ditshwantsho tsa botaki di tlaa rekisiwa mo kgweding e ka dimilione tsa didolara di ka $70.

translation.en: I hope the people like my work, and the humans and I can collaborate in new and exciting ways going forward, Sophia said in her studio, speaking in a flat voice.
translation.tn: Ke solofela gore batho ba tlaa rata tiro ya me, le gore nna le bona re ka kgona go dirisana mmogo ka ditsela tse dišwa go ya kwa pele, Sophia o buile jalo kwa setudiong sa gagwe, a bua ka lentswe le le tlase.

translation.en: She wore a silver-coloured dress and held a pen.
translation.tn: O ne a apare mosese wa selefera mme a tshwere pene.

translation.en: Sophia, who was unveiled in 2016, produced her art in collaboration with 31-year-old Italian digital artist Andrea Bonaceto, known for colourful portraits, some of which depict famous people, such as Teslas chief executive, Elon Musk.
translation.tn: Sophia, yo o tlhageletseng ka ngwaga wa 2016, o ntshitse botsweretshi jwa gagwe ka go dirisana mmogo le motsweretshi wa tsa dijithale wa dingwaga di le 31, Sentadiana Andrea Bonaceto, yo o itsegeng ka ditshwantsho tse di nang le mebala, dingwe tsa tsona di bontsha batho ba ba tumileng ba ba tshwanang le Mokhuduthamaga, Tesla, Elon Musk.

translation.en: The robot has combined elements from Bonacetos works, art history, and her own physical drawings or paintings on various surfaces multiple times in a process her creator David Hanson describes as iterative loops of evolution.
translation.tn: Roboto e, e kopantse dintlha go tloga ka ditiro tsa ga Boanceto, hisetori ya botaki le ditshwantsho tsa gagwe tse di takilweng mo mafelong a a farologaneng, ka dinako tse di farologaneng mo thulaganyong e David Hanson a e tlhalosang jaaka sengwe se tlisang phetogo.

translation.en: We use transformer networks and genetic algorithms in my art, and other kinds of computational creativity, Sophia added.
translation.tn: Re dirisa dineteweke tsa teransefora le dikgato-tharabololo mo botaking jwa me, le mefuta e mengwe ya boitlhamedi jwa khomputara. Sophia a tlaleletsa.

translation.en: My algorithms output unique patterns that never existed in the world before.
translation.tn: Dikgato-tharabololo tsa me tsa dipaterone tse di iseng di nneng teng mo lefatsheng.

translation.en: So I think the machines can be creative.
translation.tn: Ka jalo ke akanya gore metšhine e kgona go nna botlhale.

translation.en: After the auction, Sophia will interact with the successful bidder, to study his or her face, and add a final inspired brushstroke to the artwork.
translation.tn: Morago ga thekiso, Sophia o tlaa golagana le moreki yo o atlegileng, go sekaseka sefatlhego sa gagwe, le go oketsa mo botaking jo a setseng a bo dirile.

translation.en: This will serve, says Hanson, to make it a unique artwork encompassing data of the new owner and that personal connection, at that moment in time.
translation.tn: Seno se tlaa dira, go bua Hanson, go dira setshwantsho sa botaki se se sa tlwaelesegang, se se akaretsang tshedimosetso ya moreki yo mošwa le kgolagano ya sebele, ka yona nako eo.

translation.en: Bonaceto said the collaboration aimed to make a statement in the art world, and even the technology world, heralding a new road on which AI robots and humans collaborate, enhancing each other.
translation.tn: Bonaceto o rile tirisanommogo e e ikaeletseng go dira setatamente mo lefatsheng la botaki, tota le mo lefatsheng la thekenoloji, e e tlhagotseng e diroboto tsa AI le batho di ka dirisanang mmogo, go godisana.

translation.en: Sophia’s art could be a very, very important historical piece, said Pablo Fraile, an art collector based in Miami and an early buyer of Beeple, as American artist Mike Winkelmann, creator of the NFT work sold this month for millions, is known.
translation.tn: Botsweretshi jwa ga Sophia bo ka nna karolo e e botlhokwa thata ya hisetori, go bua Pablo Fraile, mokgobokanyi wa didiriswa tsa botaki yo o tswang kwa Miami, yo e bile e le moreki wa go sale gale wa Beeple, jaaka fa motaki wa kwa Amerika, Mike Winkelmann, modiri wa tiro ya NFT e e rekisitsweng mo kgweding e e ka dimilione, a itsege.

translation.en: Its the first time these ideas are put together.
translation.tn: Ke lwantllha dikakanyo tse di kopanngwa.

translation.en: It would pave the way for more innovation in the AI art space, he added.
translation.tn: E tlaa tlhagola tsela ya go tla ka dikakanyo tse dišwa tsa botaki, a tlaleletsa.

translation.en: US-based IV Gallery will represent Sophia as an artist and promote her.
translation.tn: Sekhutlwanapontsho sa kwa US IV se tlaa emela Sophia jaaka motaki le go mo rotloetsa.

translation.en: Sophia has that unlimited freedom, like a five-year-old has, and no restrictions to what she can do, said gallery director Vincent Harrison.
translation.tn: Sophia o na le kgololosego e e sa lekanyediwang, jaaka ngwana wa dingwaga di le 5, mme ga go sepe se se thibelang bokgoni jwa gagwe, go bua mokaedi wa sekhutlwanapontsho, Vincent Harrison.

translation.en: Its fascinating to see this new way to create.
translation.tn: Go a kgatlhisa go bona tsela e ntšhwa e ya go tlhola dilo.

translation.en: Barcelona ravers have found a way to get round COVID-19 curbs on clubs by holding outdoor silent discos in some of the city’s best-known locations.
translation.tn: Batho ba kwa Barcelona ba ba ratang diphati ba bone tsela ya go fenya melawang ya COVID-19 ka go  tshwara diphathi tse di se nang modumo kwa mafelong a a farologaneng a a itseweng mo toropong.

translation.en: On Sunday, people welcomed the first day of spring by putting on their headphones and busting some moves at Mar Bella beach along Barcelonas famous seafront  all while respecting social distancing regulations.
translation.tn: Ka Sontaga, batho ba amogetse letsatsi la ntlha la dikgakologo ka go baya direetsamodumo mo ditsebeng tsa bona, ba tansetsa mmino kwa lewatleng la MAR Bella kwa Barcelona, mme ba dira tsotlhe tse ka go tlotla melawana ya go katogana.

translation.en: It’s been incredible, really cool.
translation.tn: Go ntse go le monate. Go gontle ka nnete.

translation.en: I didn’t expect there’d be so many people, said therapist Andres Mellado, 41.
translation.tn: Ke ne ke sa solofela gore go tlaa nna le batho ba ba ntsi jaana, go bua Ngaka, Andres Mellado wa dingwaga di le 41.

translation.en: At first it seems a bit odd dancing in the middle of Barcelona and people were stopping to look, but its beautiful.
translation.tn: Kwa tshimologong, go lebega go sa nna sentle, go tansa mo bogareng jwa Barcelona le batho ba ne ba ema mme lebelela, fela go gontle.

translation.en: Its a great thing to do on a Sunday morning, come here and connect a bit to the music, he said.
translation.tn: Ke selo se sentle se o ka se dirang mo mosong wa Sontaga, go tla fa le go golagana le mmino, o ne a bua jalo.

translation.en: What started off as a fun meet-up between friends has grown into a regular Sunday morning event, the Tribu Silent Disco.
translation.tn: Se se simolotseng jaaka kopana ya go intsha bodutu magareng ga ditsala se godile go nna moletlo wa gale wa mo mosong wa letsatsi la Latshipi; moletlo wa mmino o o didimetseng.

translation.en: One took place at the famous Magic Fountain in the neighbourhood of Montjuic.
translation.tn: O mongwe o ne o tshwaretswe kwa motsweding o o tumileng kwa tikologong ya Montjuic.

translation.en: (We asked ourselves) what could we do to boost dancing now that there are so many restrictions?
translation.tn: (re ipoditseng potso) ke eng se re ka re se dirang go tlhotlheletsa go bina ka ntlha ya fa go na le dikgoreletsi?

translation.en: And we had the idea to do it outdoors and with headphones, Silent Disco co-founder Xavi Panella told Reuters.
translation.tn: Mme re ne ra tla ka kakanyo ya go kopanela kwa ntle ka tiriso ya direetsamodumo, didimetseng headphones, mothei-mmogo wa Silent Disco Xavi Panella o boleletse Reuters.

translation.en: First we told friends and acquaintances and then people joined because we do it outdoors and in beautiful places where we dont bother anyone and we maintain a safe distance.
translation.tn: Sa ntlha re boleletse ditsala le batho ba ba gaufi le rona mme batho ba ne ba tla ka ntlha ya gore re e direlwa kwa ntle, kwa mafelong a mantle, kwa re sa tshwenyeng ope gona mme re tlhokomela sekgala sa loago se se babalesegileng.

translation.en: Experts say grass pollen counts in the Northern Cape have doubled compared to last season.
translation.tn: Baitseanape ba re mmudula kwa Kapa Bokone le go oketsegile gabedi fa go bapisiwa le setlha se se fetileng.

translation.en: This is attributed to the recent heavy rains.
translation.tn: Se se kaiwa fa e le ka ntlha ya dipula tse di neleng thata.

translation.en: Pollen is a common cause of hay fever and can also affect those who have asthma.
translation.tn: Mmudula ke nngwe ya dilo tse di tlisang letshoroma la kethimolo, mme e ka ama gape le ba ba nang le bolwetse jwa mafatlha.

translation.en: But experts say those who are prone to allergies can breathe a sigh of relief as the pollen season is about to end.
translation.tn: Mme baitseanape ba re ba ba tlhaselwang ke dialeji ba se tshwenyege ka ntlha ga gore setlha sa mmudula se tloga se ya kwa bokhutlong.

translation.en: Ear, Nose and Throat specialist, Doctor Werner Hoek, has been monitoring the province and collecting pollen data.
translation.tn: Mankge wa ditsebe, dinko le mometso, Ngaka Werner Hoek, o ntse o tlhokometse porofense mme a kgobonya tshedimosetso ya mmudula.

translation.en: It’s important because we don’t know what’s going on at this stage.
translation.tn: E botlhokwa ka gonne ga re itse gore go diragalang mo nakong e.

translation.en: Research has shown that large volumes of pollen can interfere with normal anti-viral immunity.
translation.tn: Dipatlisiso di supile gore mmudula o montsi thata  o ka kgoreletsa thulaganyo e e tlwaelegileng ya mmele ya go lwantsha malwetse.

translation.en: Leading South African aerobiologist, Doctor Dilys Berman says, From last years experience, towards the end of March beginning of April there should be some relief for allergy sufferers, its a good idea to look for pollen counts on our website, which is www.pollencounts.co.za.
translation.tn: Ngaka e e itlhomileng kwa pele mo Aforikaborwa  Dilys Berman a re, go ya ka maitemogelo a gagwe, go ya kwa bokhutlong jwa kgwedi ya Mopitlwe go ya kwa tshimologong ya kgwedi ya Moranang, go tshwanetse go nne le go gololosega go ba ba tshwenngwang ke dialeji, ke kakanyo e e siameng go tlhola dinomoro tsa mmudula mo webosaeteng ya rona, e leng www.pollencounts.co.za.

translation.en: Many South Africans suffer from hay fever or allergic rhinitis.
translation.tn: Bontsi jwa Maaforikaborwa bo tshwarwa ke letshoroma la kethimolo kgotsa dialeji.

translation.en: It is estimated that SA allergy sufferers fork out more than R480 million a year on allergy medication.
translation.tn: Go lekanyetswa gore MaAforikaborwa a a tshwenngwang ke dialeji, a ntsha madi a a fetang dimilione di le R480 ka ngwaga go reka melemo ya dialeji.

translation.en: We sat down with Prof Jonny Peter to find out why.
translation.tn: Re dutse le Moporofesara Jonny Peter go utlwa gore, goreng go ntse jalo.

translation.en: Celebrations to mark the Golden Jubilee of the historic Artscape building complex in the Mother City kicks off today with a gala concert in celebration of Human Rights Day.
translation.tn: Mekete ya go tshwaya Golden Jubilee ya hisetori ya go aga kwa toropong ya kwa Cape Town (Mother City) e simolola gompieno ka moletlo wa dikonsarata go keteka Letsatsi la ditshwanelo tsa Botho.

translation.en: The stylish affair is said to feature performers from Artscapes six associated companies, as well as the Capes best entertainers.
translation.tn: Tiragalo e e nang le setaele e, e solofetswe go akaretsa badiragatsi ba ba tswang kwa ditlamong di le thataro tse di tsamaelanang tsa Artscape, gammogo le badiragatsi ba ba tlhwatlhwa ba kwa Kapa.

translation.en: The two-hour-long spectacular will be recorded in the Opera House and presented to audiences via the playhouses YouTube channel free of charge.
translation.tn: Tiragatso ya di ura tse pedi e e tlaa gatisiwang kwa ntlong ya mmino wa Opera, e be e isiwa kwa bareetsing ka tšhanele ya YouTube e e sa duelweng.

translation.en: Artscape Theatres CEO Marlene Le Roux speaks about the celebrations.
translation.tn: Mookamedi wa lefelo la bobogelo la Artscape, Marlene le Roux o bua ka ga mekete.

translation.en: Parts of former US President Donald Trump’s Palm Beach, Florida, golf resort have been temporarily closed because of a coronavirus outbreak, according to two sources familiar with the matter.
translation.tn: Dikarolo dingwe tsa lefelo la moporesitente wa maloba Donald Trump la go tshameka kolofo kwa Palm Beach, kwa Florida le tswadilwe nakwana ka ntlha ya mogare wa corona, se ke go ya ka metswedi e mebedi e e itseng ka ga kgang e.

translation.en: A source familiar with club operations said some workers had been quarantined out of an abundance of caution, and a section of the club had been closed for a short period of time.
translation.tn: Motswedi o o itseng ka ga ditiro tsa mokgatlho a re badiri ba bangwe ba faphetswe kwa thoko go dira bonnete jwa gore go na le kelotlhoko, mme karolo nngwe ya lefelo leo e tswetswe nakwana.

translation.en: No further details were immediately available about the number of infections or what portions of the club had been closed, or when they would reopen.
translation.tn: Ga go na dintlha tse dingwe tse di di le teng ka ga palo ya ditshwaetso kgotsa gore ke karolo efe ya lefelo e e tswetsweng, le gore e tlaa bulwa leng.

translation.en: Trump and his family moved to the Mar-a-Lago resort on January 20, the day his successor Joe Biden was sworn in as president.
translation.tn: Trump le ba lelapa la gagwe ba fudugetse kwa Mar-a-Lago ka di 20 tsa kgwedi ya Ferikgong, letsatsi le ka lona Joe Biden o neng a tlhomiwa jaaka moporesitente.

translation.en: After weeks of staying out of the limelight, Trump used a speech to US conservatives in Orlando, Florida, to repeat his false claim that he won the 2020 election and hinted at a possible presidential run in 2024.
translation.tn: Morago ga dibeke a tlogile mo matlhong a batho, trump o dirisisetse puo e a neng a e lebisetse go batho ba kwa US kwa Orlando, Florida, go boeletsa tshedimosetso e e fosagetseng ya gore o fentse ditlhopho tsa ngwaga wa 2020 mme a umaka gape le kgonagalo ya gore a tsenele ditlhopho ka ngwaga wa  2024.

translation.en: Trump was hospitalised for several days in October after contracting the virus.
translation.tn: Trump o ne a robatswa kwa bookelong malatsi a mmalwa ka kgwedi ya Diphalane morago ga go tsenwa ke mogare.

translation.en: His wife, Melania and son Barron also tested positive.
translation.tn: Mosadi wa gagwe Melania, le morwa wa gagwe Barron le bona ba tshwaetsegile,

translation.en: The late actress Noxolo Noxee Maqashalala has been laid to rest at Mpoza Village in KwaBhaca in the Eastern Cape.
translation.tn: Modigaratsi Noxolo Noxee Maqashalala yo o tlogetseng lefatshe le le ka kwano o fitlhilwe kwa Motseng wa  Mpoza, Kwabhaca,  kwa Kapa Botlhaba.

translation.en: She passed away in her Honeydew home in Johannesburg last week.
translation.tn: O tlhokafaletse kwa legaeng la gagwe kwa Honeydew kwa Johannesburg mo bekeng e e fetileng.

translation.en: In a moving funeral service, speakers described her as someone whose dedication and love for her work will never be forgotten.
translation.tn: Mo tirelong phitlho e e utlwisang botlhoko, dibui di mo tlhalositse jaaka motho yo boineelo le lorato le a neng a na le lona mo tirong ya gagwe le ka se lebalwe.

translation.en: The television actress played in Generations, Tsha Tsha, Intersexions and Rhythm City amongst others.
translation.tn: Modiragatsi wa Thelebišene yo o tshamekileng mo Generations, Tsha Tsha, Intersexions le Rhythm City gareng ga tse dingwe.

translation.en: Family spokesperson, Khabonina Nyikinya, says Maqashalala had been battling depression for a long time and that she preferred staying alone.
translation.tn: Mmueledi wa lelapa Khabonina Nyikinya, a re Maqashalala o na le nako le nako e telele a na la bolwetse jwa kgatelelo ya maikutlo mme o ne a rata go nna e le nosi.

translation.en: We are not blaming anyone that Noxolo passed away whilst she was alone in her house.
translation.tn: Ga re tshwaye ope phoso gore Noxolo o tlhokafetse fa a ne a le esi mo ntlong ya gagwe.

translation.en: She was a lady who was living in her own apartment.
translation.tn: Ke mosadi yo o neng a nna kwa ntlong ya gagwe.

translation.en: But that doesn’t mean she was disconnected from the family.
translation.tn: Fela seo ga se reye gore one a kgaogane le lelapa la gagwe.

translation.en: We have a big family in Gauteng even in Eastern Cape.
translation.tn: Re na le lelapa le legolo mo Gauteng le kwa Kapa Botlhaba.

translation.en: We communicate with each other.
translation.tn: Re a tlhaeletsana .

translation.en: So it was just a shock to us that she passed away without maybe some of them have checked on her.
translation.tn: Ka jalo, e ne e le letshogo go rona gore o tlhokafetse kwa ntle le gore bangwe ba bona ba ye go mo lekola.

translation.en: But we believe that she was a person who needed her own space, Nyikinya said.
translation.tn: Mme re dumela gore ke motho yo o neng a rata gore a newe nako ya gagwe a le nosi Nyikinya o buile jalo.

translation.en: The actress’s colleagues say the entertainment industry has suffered a huge blow.
translation.tn: Badirammogo le modiragatsi yo ba re intaseteri e itemogetse tatlhegelo e e boitshegang.

translation.en: Colleague and friend, Zuko Nodada, has praised Maqashalala for the love of her craft.
translation.tn: Modirimmogo le tsala, Zuko Nodada, o akgoletse Maqashalala lerato le a neng a na le lona mo tirong ya gagwe.

translation.en: I’ve worked with Noxolo for 18 years.
translation.tn: Ke dirile le Noxolo dingwaga dingwaga di le 18.

translation.en: Our first project was Tsha Tsha
translation.tn: Porojeke wa rona ya ntlha e e ne e le Tsha Tsha

translation.en: There is no day uNoxolo would come to set not knowing her lines, not having prepared for the scenes.
translation.tn: Ga go na le letsatsi lepe le Noxolo o neng a tla kwa tirong a sa itse tiro ya gagwe kgotsa a sa ipaakanyetsa tiro.

translation.en: She was a creative
translation.tn: O ne a na le kgoboni jwa go botlhami.

translation.en: She started directing in 2016, if I remember in one of my projects, The Kingdom, uKhakhayi.
translation.tn: O simolotse go kaela ka 2016, fa ke gakologelwa mo go nngwe ya diporojeke tsa me, The Kingdom ukhakhayi.

translation.en: She went on to co-create and executive produced Diamond City.
translation.tn: O ne a tswela pele go ya dira le go kaela Diamond City.

translation.en: It is a great loss to the industry; I’m not going to lie.
translation.tn: Ke tatlhegelo e kgolo tota mo  intasetering, ga ke batle go bua maaka.

translation.en: The Artscape Theatre Centre in Cape Town says there is a need to relook the funding for the Arts industry.
translation.tn: Teatere ya senthara ya Artscape  kwa Cape Town ya re go na le tlhokego ya go gobelelwe gape matlole a intaseteri ya Botsweretshi.

translation.en: It was reacting to the closure of the iconic Fugard Theatre in District Six earlier this week due to the impact of COVID-19.
translation.tn: E ne e bua e lebeletse go tswalwa ga lefelo la bobogelo la Fugard  mo sedikeng sa borataro go sa le gale mo bekeng e ka ntlha ya seabe sa COVID-19.

translation.en: Fugard Theatre benefactor, Eric Abraham, said they were not convinced that the theatre could be COVID-19 safe and financially stable again.
translation.tn: Modiramolemo wa bobogelo jwa Fugard, Eric Abraham, o rile ba ne ba sa dumele gore bobogelo jo bo tlaa babalesega ka ntlha ya COVID-19, le gore a bo tla nna le tsamaiso e e lolameng ya matlole gape.

translation.en: CEO of Artscape, Marlene Le Roux, says the pandemic and its associated lockdowns have decimated the arts industry.
translation.tn: Mokhuduthamaga wa Artscape, Marlene le Roux, a re leroborobo le kiletsometsamao di bolaile intaseteri ya botsweretshi.

translation.en: We have an interest in Fugard because of all the productions like the West Side Story.
translation.tn: Re na le kgatlhego mo Fugard ka ntlha ya dintshokuno tse di tshwanang le West Side Story.

translation.en: So it is about young people, it is about emerging artists that could travel the world because of the Fugard.
translation.tn: Ka jalo ke ka ga batho ba bašwa, ke ka ga batsweretshi ba ba simololang, ba ba ka tsamayang lefatshe lotlhe ka ntlha ya Fugard.

translation.en: For the industry as a whole, if one theatre closes it has an effect on another theatre, we need to relook at the funding for the artists, says Le Roux.
translation.tn: Go intaseteri ka bophara, fa lefelo le le lengwe le bogogelo le tswalwa, se se nna le tshusumetso mo mafelong a mangwe  a bobogelo, re tlhoka go lebelela matlole a badiragatsi, go bua Le Roux.

translation.en: The Fugard Theatre was named in honour of one of South Africa’s most acclaimed and renowned international playwright, Athol Fugard.
translation.tn: Bobogelo jwa Fugard bo filwe leina le ka go tlotla mongwe wa bakwadi ba metshameko mo Aforikaborwa, yo o tumileng thata le go itsege kwa dinageng di sele, Athol Fugard.

translation.en: All of Athol Fugard’s recent plays had their premieres in the theatre.
translation.tn: Metshameko ya ga Athol Fugard yotlhe ya bošeng e ile ya bontshiwa kwa bobogelong.

translation.en: The 320-seater playhouse opened its doors and lifted its curtains in March 2010.
translation.tn: Ntlo ya bobogelo e e nang le ditulo di le 320 e butse dikgoro tsa yona le go tsholetsa digaretene tsa yona ka Mopitlwe 2010.

translation.en: Over the past decade, it has showcased many of the best plays and musicals from all over the world including with international stars such as Sir Ian McKellen and the late Alan Rickman, either playing at or visiting the preferred venue on special occasions during its lifetime.
translation.tn: Mo ngwagasomeng o o fetileng, e bontshitse metshameko ya mmino e mentsi go tswa mo lefatsheng ka bophara go akaretsa le dinaledi tsa boditšhabatšhaba jaaka Rre Ian Mckellen le moswi Alan Rickman, ba ba neng ba tshameka mo kgotsa ba etela lefelo le le rategang mo mabakeng a a kgethegileng mo go yona.

translation.en: The world-renowned Rickman, who died about four years ago, had only the best to say about the Fugard.
translation.tn: Rickman, yo o itsegeng lefatshe ka bophara, yo o tlhokafetseng dingwaga tse nne tse di fetileng, o buile tse dintle fela ka Fugard.

translation.en: I am an enormous admirer of this company, their enormous work, I’ve seen pretty much everything they have done, its one of those things that seem shouldn’t have been there but it’s there, said Rickman.
translation.tn: Ke motho yo o ratang setlamo se thata, tiro yo bona e kgolo, ke setse ke bone sengwe le sengwe se ba se dirileng, ke nngwe ya dilo tse di bonagalang o kare di ne di sa tshwanela go nna teng, mme di teng. Go bua Rickman.

translation.en: Past productions also include Statements After An Arrest Under The Immorality Act, a new production of a Fugard classic.
translation.tn: Metshameko e e fetileng le yona e akaretsa ditatamente morago ga go tshwarwa ka fa tlase ga Molao wa go tshelela ruri, ntshokuno e ntšhwa ya Fugard Classic.

translation.en: It was a play that shined the spotlight on the cruelty of apartheid South Africa’s law which prohibited interracial romance.
translation.tn: Ke motshameko o ileng wa galalela mo matlhong a babogi, ka ga bosetlhogo jwa molao wa Aforikaborwa wa tlhaolele, o o neng o thibela go ratang ga batho ba lotso lo lo farologaneng.

translation.en: It is here that many landmark productions, such as the musicals King Kong and Kat and the Kings were produced.
translation.tn: Ke teng fa, fa bontsi jwa metshameko e e tshwanang le ditiragatso tsa mmino King Kong & Kat le Kings e ntshitsweng gona.

translation.en: The theatre was also home to many of theatre legends, including David Kramer’s productions.
translation.tn: Bobogedi jo e ne e le legae go bagaka ba le bantsi ba teatere, go akaretsa le David Kramer productions.

translation.en: The building is owned by the District Six Museum.
translation.tn: Kago e e tshwerwe ke musiamo wa District Six.

translation.en: Acting director, Chrischene Julius, says it is still unclear how it will be used in the future.
translation.tn: Mokaedi wa nama-o-sa-tshwere Chrischene Julius, a re go sa ntse go sa lolama gore e tlaa dirisiwa jang mo isagweng.

translation.en: With us, its very sad that the theatre has taken a decision to close down, and obviously done that having thought through the decision.
translation.tn: Mo go rona, go botlhoko thata gore teatere e tsere tshwetso ya go tswala, mme go a bonala gore bat sere nako ya go akanya ka tshwetso e.

translation.en: From our side, it’s going to be almost the end of the era in this part of the city because Fugard is well established as one of the cultural spots in Cape Town, says Julius.
translation.tn: Go tswa mo letlhakoreng la rona, e tlile go nna bokhutlo jwa paka mo karolong eno ya toropo ka gonne Fugard e ikemetse sentle jaaka nngwe ya mafelo a setso a kwa Cape Town, go bua Julius.

translation.en: To promote access to information, the South African Library for the Blind (SALB), in partnership with the Department of Arts and Culture in the Eastern Cape, has launched an audio book studio at the Mdantsane Library.
translation.tn: Go rotloetsa phitlhelelo ya tshedimosetso, Laeborari ya Aforika Borwa ya Difofu (SALB), ka go dirisana mmogo le Lefapha la Botsweretshi le Setso kwa Kapa Botlhaba, e thangkgolotse setudio sa buka ya dikgatiso kwa laeborari ya kwa Mdantsane.

translation.en: SALB has agreements with most publishers to reproduce their materials in braille and audio formats.
translation.tn: SALB e na le ditumelano le bontsi jwa baphasalatsi go tlhagisa didiriswa ka mafoko a a gatisitsweng le ka dikgatiso tse di nang le modumo.

translation.en: The facility will allow narrators to record books for the visually impaired using high-tech equipment.
translation.tn: Setheo seno se tlaa letla baanedi go rekota dibuka tsa batho ba ba sa boneng ka go dirisa didiriswa tsa thekenoloji e e kwa godimo.

translation.en: Most public libraries are not designed to accommodate the needs of blind or partially sighted people.
translation.tn: Bontsi jwa dilaeborari tsa setšhaba ga di a direlwa go akaretsa ditlhokego tsa batho ba nang le dikgwetlho tsa go bona kgotsa tsa matlho.

translation.en: In most cases, they are forced to rely on other people to read and write for them.
translation.tn: Mo mabakeng a le mantsi, ba patelesega go ikaega mo bathong ba bangwe gore ba ba buisetse le gore ba ba kwalele.

translation.en: Mustafa Lisithi from Mdantsane is one of the blind people expected to benefit from the project.
translation.tn: Mustafa Lisithi go tswa kwa Mdantsane, ke mongwe wa batho ba ba sa boneng, ba ba solofetsweng go ungwa go tswa mo porojekeng e.

translation.en: He says he is excited about the new facility at the library.
translation.tn: A re o itumeletse kago e ntšwha kwa laeborari.

translation.en: Blindness makes us feel excluded from accessing service such as accessing information.
translation.tn: Bofofu bo dira gore re ikutlwe re sa akarediwe mo go fitlheleleng ditirelo tse di tshwanang le go fitlhelela tshedimosetso.

translation.en: There are no computer systems that are programmed for blind people so this is an obstacles that we encounter as blind people, says Lisithi.
translation.tn: Ga go na le dithulaganyo tsa khomphiutara tse di diretsweng difofu, ka jalo se, ke sekgoreletsi se re kopanang le sona jaaka difofu, go bua Lisithi.

translation.en: Eastern Cape Sports, recreation, Arts and Culture MEC, Fezeka Nkomonye, says this initiative will help promote literacy.
translation.tn: Mokhuduthamaga wa Kapa Botlhaba wa lefapha la Metshameko, Boitapoloso, Botsweretshi le Setso Fezeka Nkomonye, a re letsholo leno le tla thusa go rotloetsa go ithuta.

translation.en: A library is a very quiet space,  it’s a space where you can get private information so their right to access to information has been prejudiced for the longest of time.
translation.tn: Laeborari ke lefelo le le didimetseng thata, ke lefelo le mo go lona o ka fitlhelang  tshedimosetso ya poraefete ka jalo, tshwanelo ya bona ya go bona tshedimosetso e gatakilwe nako e e telele.

translation.en: We wanted to ensure that we give them access to information during this human rights month says Nkomonye.
translation.tn: Re ne re batla go netefatsa gore re ba naya phitlhelelo ya tshedimosetso mo kgweding ya ditshwanelo tsa botho, go bua Nkomonye.

translation.en: The visually impaired are also exposed to other challenges in the community and are vulnerable to criminals.
translation.tn: Difofu le tsona di lebagane le dikgwetlho tse dingwe mo setšhabeng mme ba iphitlhela ba tlhaselwa ke disenyi.

translation.en: SALB CEO, Mandla Ntobela, says they try to assist them with life skills as well.
translation.tn: Moeteledipele wa SALB, Mandla Ntobela, a re ba leka go ba thusa le ka bokgoni jwa tsa botshelo.

translation.en: In a way, the government is trying to ensure that rights for blind people are accommodated.
translation.tn: Ka tsela e, puso e leka go netefatsa gore ditshwanelo tsa batho ba e leng difofu le tsona di sireletsegile.

translation.en: They’re in a way violated because when they walk in the streets, they’re vulnerable to being robbed of their belongings.
translation.tn: Di a gatakakiwa ka tsela e e rileng ka ntlha ya gore fa ba tsamaya mo mebileng, ba nna mo kotsing ya go tshwarwa poo le go tseelwa dithoto tsa bona.

translation.en: We also provide them with skills on how to deal with challenges in relation to what could happen in their private spaces.
translation.tn: Gape re ba tlamela ka bokgoni jwa go samagana le dikgwetlho tse di mabapi le se se ka ba diragagelang mo poraefeteng.

translation.en: The province needs to build 487 libraries in order for all communities to have access to books and information.
translation.tn: Porofense e tshwanetse go aga dilaeborari di le 487 gore baagi botlhe ba kgone go nna le phitlhelelo ya dibuka le tshedimosetso.

translation.en: Singer-songwriter Griff has won the 2021 BRITs Rising Star award, organisers of Britain’s pop music honours said on Friday.
translation.tn: Seopedi le mokwadi wa dipina, Griff o fentse sekgele sa 2021 sa naledi e e ipogatsang, barulaganyi ba kgono ya mmino wa Pop ba buile jalo ka Labotlhano.

translation.en: The Mirror Talk and Forgive Myself singer beat off competition from rapper Pa Salieu and singer Rina Sawayama to the prize, whose past winners include Adele, Sam Smith, Emeli Sande and Celeste.
translation.tn: Seopedi sa Mirror Talk le Forgive Myself se fentse kgaisano magareng ga seopedi sa mmino wa Rap Pa Salieu le Seopedi Rina Sawayama, se mo nakong e e fetileng se fentsweng ke diopedi tse di akaretsang, Adele, Sam Smith, Emeli Sande le Celeste.

translation.en: In my head Im still screaming from the phone call when I found out, the 20-year-old, who released several songs last year, said in a statement.
translation.tn: Mo tlhogong ya me, ke santse ke goeletsa ka ntlha ya mogala o ke o amogetseng, wa dingwaga di le 20, yo o golotseng dipina di le mmalwa mo ngwageng o o fetileng o tlhalositse mo puong ya gagwe.

translation.en: Its honestly such a miracle: how on earth did we manage to win a BRIT and break through during a pandemic?
translation.tn: E tota e le motlholo: Go tlile jang gore re kgone go fenya sekgele sa BRIT le go tlhagelela ka nako ya leroborobo?

translation.en: Born to a Chinese mother and Jamaican father, Griff, who sings about teenage love and mental health in her latest song Black Hole, was last year nominated for an Ivor Novello Rising Star award.
translation.tn: Yo o belegweng ke mme wa kwa China le rre wa kwa Jamaica, Griff, yo o opelang ka ga go ima ga bašwa le boitekanelo jwa tlhaloganyo mo pineng ya gagwe ya sešweng Black Hole, o ne a tlhophiwa go ikgapela sekgele sa Ivor Novello sa dinaledi tse dišwa.

translation.en: The BRIT Awards will take place in May.
translation.tn: Moletlo wa dikgele wa BRIT o tlaa tshwarwa ka kgwedi ya Motsheganong.

translation.en: Lawyers for Britney Spears will again ask a Los Angeles court in April to make official the replacement of her father as her conservator in a long-running battle over control of her personal and financial affairs.
translation.tn: Babueledi ba ga Britney Spears ba tlaa kopa kgotlatshekelo ya kwa Los Angeles ka Moranang go dira semmuso, tloso ya ga rraagwe jaaka molaodi wa gagwe mo ntweng e e sa bolong go simolola ya gore a kgone go laola merero ya gagwe ya ditšhelete ka boena.

translation.en: Her lawyer, Samuel Ingham, told a court hearing on Wednesday that he would ask that Jodi Montgomery, who in 2019 was appointed temporary conservator of the singers personal affairs, be made permanent.
translation.tn: Mmueledi wa gagwe, Samuel Ingham, o boleletse kgotlatshekelo ka Laboraro gore o tlaa kopa gore Jodi Montgomery, yo ka 2019 o ne a tlhomiwa jaaka molaodi wa nakwana wa merero ya seopedi se, a fiwe setulo sa leruri.

translation.en: Ingham said he would present the petition at a 27 April hearing.
translation.tn: Ingham o rile o tla tlhagisa boikuelo kwa ditheetsong ka di 27 tsa kgwedi ya Moranang.

translation.en: Britney Spears, now 39, has made clear through her lawyer in the past year that she no longer wants her father involved in her affairs.
translation.tn: Britney Spears wa dingwaga di le 39, o tlhalositse go utlwala ka go dirisa mmueledi wa gagwe mo ngwageng o o fetileng gore, ga a tlhole a batla gore rraagwe a nne le seabe mo mererong ya gagwe.

translation.en: A previous bid to remove him failed in August 2020.
translation.tn: Maiteko a go mo tlosa a paletswe ka kgwedi ya Phatwe 2020.

translation.en: Montgomery, the singers care manager, took over from the singer’s father Jamie Spears after he suffered a bout of ill health.
translation.tn: Montgomery, motsamaisi le motlhokomedi wa seopedi se, o tsere maemo a ga rraagwe, Jamie Spears morago ga gore a tlhaselwe ke bolwetsi.

translation.en: Jamie Spears remains the legal guardian of his daughters financial affairs but is now sharing those duties with a financial institution.
translation.tn: Jamie spears e santse e le motlhokomedi wa semolao wa merero ya ditšhelete tsa morwadiagwe, mme jaanong o abelana maikarabelo ao le setheo sa matlole.

translation.en: A planned court review on Wednesday of the pop stars finances was postponed for a month.
translation.tn: Tshekatsheko ya kgotlatshekelo e e neng e tshwanetse e diragale ka Laboraro, ya merero ya ditšhelete tsa naledi ya mmino wa Pop, e ne ya busediwa morago ka kgwedi.

translation.en: Jamie Spears was appointed conservator in 2008 after his daughter was hospitalised for psychiatric treatment following a widely publicised breakdown.
translation.tn: Jamie Spears o ne a tlhomiwa go nna modiradiphetogo ka 2008 morago ga gore morwadie a tsene kwa bookelong go senka kalafi ya bolwetse jo bo amang tlhaloganyo morago ga go nna le go thubega ga tlhaloganyo mo pepeneneng.

translation.en: A television documentary in February brought new scrutiny to the case and to the #FreeBritney movement started by fans.
translation.tn: Pontsho ya thelebišene ya Tlhakole e e tla sekasekwa go ntse le # freebritney o simolotse ka baetleetsi ba ba gaisang.

translation.en: #FreeBritney supporters believe Spears is being kept prisoner and that she is sending cryptic signals begging to be freed through her social media accounts.
translation.tn: Batshegetsi ba #freebritney# ba dumela gore Spears o tshela jaaka motshwarwa le gore o romela matshwao a mo go ona ikopelang gore a gololwe mo diakhaontong tsotlhe tsa gagwe tsa mmedia wa loago.

translation.en: Vivian Thoreen, an attorney for Jamie Spears, noted in February the pop star had never requested the termination of the legal arrangement.
translation.tn: Vivian Thoreen, mmueledi wa ga Jamie spears, o tlhalositse ka kgwedi ya Tlhakole gore, sebini sa mmino wa Pop ga se ise se kope go khutlisa thulaganyo ya semolao.

translation.en: This is a story about a fiercely loyal, loving, and dedicated father who rescued his daughter from a life-threatening situation.
translation.tn: E, ke kgang ya rre yo o ikanyegang, yo o lorato, le yo o boineelo, yo o pholositseng morwadie mo seemong se se neng se tshosetsa botshelo jwa gagwe.

translation.en: People were harming her.
translation.tn: Batho ba ne ba mo utlwisa botlhoko.

translation.en: They were exploiting her, Thoreen told TV show Good Morning America in an interview.
translation.tn: Ba ne ba mo dirisa, Thoreen o boleletse lenaneo la thelebišhene, Good Morning America mo dipotsolotsong.

translation.en: Anytime Britney wants to end her conservatorship she can ask her lawyer to file a petition to terminate it, Thoreen said.
translation.tn: Nako nngwe le nngwe fela ba Britney a batla go fedisa botsalano jwa gagwe le molaodi wa gagwe, a ka botsa mmueledi a go tlhatlhela boikuelo go bo fedisa, go bua Thoreen.

translation.en: The Oscars ceremony in April will be an intimate, in-person gathering, held without Zoom and limited to nominees, presenters and their guests, the producers said on Thursday.
translation.tn: Moletlo wa oscars ka Moranang tlaa nna wa kopano ya sebele, e e tlaa tshwarwang kwa ntle ga Zoom mme e lekanyeditswe fela batlhophiwa, batsamaisi le baeng ba bona. Bantshakuno ba buile jalo ka Labone.

translation.en: Due to the coronavirus pandemic, the show to hand out the highest honours in the movie industry will be held both at the Union Station in Downtown Los Angeles and the traditional home of the Academy Awards at the Dolby Theatre in Hollywood.
translation.tn: Ka ntlha ya leroborobo la Corona, Lenaneo la go fana ka tlotla e e kwa godimo mo intasetering ya difilimi e tlaa tshwarwa kwa seteišeneng sa mokgatlho kwa toropong ya Los Angeles, le kwa legaeng la dikabelo tsa Akatemi kwa bobogelong jwa Dolby kwa Hollywood.

translation.en: Everyone will be tested, and there will be a COVID-19 safety team on site throughout the evening on April 25.
translation.tn: Mongwe le mongwe o tlaa lekolwa, mme go tla nna le setlhopa sa pabalesego sa COVID-19 kwa lefelong leo mo maitseboeng a di 25 tsa Moranang.

translation.en: There will not be an option to Zoom in for the show, producers Steven Soderbergh, Jesse Collins and Stacey Sher said in a note to the more than 200 nominees this year.
translation.tn: Ga go kitla go nna le tsela ya go lebelela lenaneo le mo Zoom, bantshakuno, Steven Soderbergh, Collins le Jesse Stacey Sher ba buile jalo mo lekwalong go batlhophiwa ba ba fetang 200 monongwaga.

translation.en: We are going to great lengths to provide a safe and enjoyable evening for all of you in person, as well as for all the millions of film fans around the world, and we feel the virtual thing will diminish those efforts, the producers added.
translation.tn: Re tlile go e go le monate mo go lona lotlhe ka namana, gammogo le go dimilione tsa filimi baetleetsi ba ba gaisang mo lefatsheng ka bophara, mme re utlwa e se se tla fokotsa maiteko ao, bantshakuno ba tlaleletsa.

translation.en: They said nominees and their guests would gather at a courtyard in the Union rail station, while other show elements would be held live inside the Dolby Theatre some 12.9 km away.
translation.tn: Ba ne ba le bone ba tla lemoga ka courtyard mo wa seteišene sa diporo, fa tse dingwe di tlaa bontsha go tshela ka teatere Dolby 12.9 tse dingwe.

translation.en: Normally, hundreds of the world’s top movie stars would gather in the 3 400-seat theatre for a live show preceded by a red carpet packed with photographers and camera crews.
translation.tn: Ka tlwaelo, makgolokgolo a a dinaledi tsa difilimi a tlaa kokoana kwa bobogelong jo bo tsenyang batho le 3 400 go bogela lenaneo le, le le tlaa simololwang ka go tsamaya mo tapeiting e e khibidu e tletseng ka batlayaditshwantsho le borra dikhamera.

translation.en: Other awards shows in recent months have replaced the usual gatherings at gala dinners and on stage with pre-recorded appearances or virtual events or a combination.
translation.tn: Mananeo a mangwe a dikabelo mo dikgweding tse di fetileng, a fediisitse dikokoano tsa mo seraleng mme ba dirisa dikokoano tse di rekotilweng pele ga nako kgotsa ditirigalo tsa mo marafatlhetlheng, kgotsa mekgawa e ka bobedi.

translation.en: Television audiences have slumped, with the Golden Globes and the Grammys attracting the smallest numbers in decades.
translation.tn: Palo ya bobegedi ba thelebišhene e ile kwa tlase, ka di Golden Globes le di Grammy di ngoka palo e nnye mo dingwagasomeng tse dintsi.

translation.en: Nominations for the Oscars were announced on Monday, with 1930s Hollywood drama
translation.tn: Kitsiso ya ditlhopho tsa di Oscars e dirilwe ka Mosupologo, ka terama ya 1930 kwa Hollywood mme 1930.

translation.en: Mank leading the field with 10, followed by The Father, Black Panther story Judas and the Black Messiah, Korean-language drama Minari, Nomadland, #MeToo revenge tale Promising Young Woman, Amazon Studio deaf dramaSound of Metal, and 1960s Vietnam War courtroom drama The Trial of the Chicago 7.
translation.tn: Mank, e e kwa pele ka dintlha di le 10, e latelwa ke The Father, Black Panther,  Judas and the Black Messiah, terama ya puo ya kwa Korea, Minari, Nomaland, MeToo, terama ya ipusolosetso Promising Young Woman, Terama ya bosusu ya kwa Amazon Studio Sound of Metal, le terama ya 1960 ya kwa Vietman ya ntwa ya kwa kgotlhatshekelo The Trial of the Chicago 7.

translation.en: A hundred life-sized bronze statues of South African icons have been illuminated in green as part of Irelands Global Greening Initiative to celebrate St Patricks Day.
translation.tn: Ditshwantsho tse di tlhomilweng tsa boronse di le lekgolo, tsa batho ba ba tumileng mo  Aforikaborwa di dikaganyeditswe ka dipone tse di tala jaaka karolo ya letsholo la kwa Ireland la go keteka letsatsi la St Patricks.

translation.en: Every year iconic landmarks around the world are lit up to celebrate Irelands national day.
translation.tn: Ngwaga mongwe le mongwe mafelo a a tumileng lefatshe lotlhe a bonesa dipone go keteka Letsatsi la bosetšhaba la Ireland.

translation.en: This year, The Long March to Freedom exhibition at Century City in Cape Town is among more than 600 sites globally to have gone green.
translation.tn: Ngwaga o, pontsho ya Long March to Freedom kwa Century City kwa Cape Town ke lengwe la mafelo a a fetang 600 mo lefatsheng lotlhe go nna botala.

translation.en: Ireland has a long history with the anti-apartheid struggle South Africa faced, including cultural, academic, and sports boycotts.
translation.tn: Ireland e na le hisetori e telele ya kgaratlho e Aforikaborwa e lebaneng le yona, go akaretsa le setso, thuto, le ikgatholoso le dikiletso tsa metshameko

translation.en: Last night, these life-sized bronze statues of South Africas heroes in the struggle for freedom and democracy took on a green hue to mark St Patricks Day
translation.tn: Maabane bosigo, ditshwantsho tse di tlhomilweng tsa bagaka ba Aforikaborwa ba kgaratlho ya kgololesego le temokerasi di tshwailwe ka botala go keteka letsatsi la St Patricks.

translation.en: Irelands national day of celebrating its culture and heritage.
translation.tn: Letsatsi la bosetšhaba la Ireland la go keteka la setso le ngwao boswa.

translation.en: Irelands Ambassador to South Africa, Fionnuala Gilsenan, says The March to Freedom celebrates the role that the Irish anti-apartheid movement played to help to dismantle the regime.
translation.tn: Moambasatara wa Ireland mo Aforikaborwa Fionnuala Gilsenan, a re mogwanto wa kgololosego o keteka karolo e e tshwamekilweng ke mokgatlho wa kwa Ireland o o kgatlhaong le tlhaolele go thusa go tlhatlhamoloma mmuso o.
