translation.en: At a time when COVID-19 has thwarted the traditional ways of celebration and travel plans of many Irish in the diaspora wishing to travel home; its hoped the greening of iconic sites across the world will unite and comfort.
translation.tn: Ka nako e COVID-19 e nyeleditseng ditsela tse di tlwaelegileng tsa go keteka le go etela kwa dinageng tse di kwa ntle, go solofetswe gore go talafadiwa ga mafelo a bagaka go ralala lefatshe go tlaa kopanya batho le go ba gomotsa.

translation.en: Spokesperson for the National Heritage Project Company, Sarah Haines, says they hope it will give many Irish citizens a sense of community.
translation.tn: Sebueledi sa porojeke ya ngwaoboswa ya bosetšhaba, Sarah Haines, a re ba solofela gore se, se tlaa naya baagi ba kwa Ireland maikutlo a boagi.

translation.en: We hope it will give them a sense that they are still part of the community that they can’t make direct contact with at the moment.
translation.tn: Re solofela gore go tlaa ba naya maikutlo a gore ba sa ntse ba le karolo ya baagi, ke fela gore ba ka se kgone go dira kgolagano ya ka tlhamalalo le bona mo nakong eno.

translation.en: We hope that they will come to visit us, we hope that they will come and celebrate the ideals that are embodied in this exhibition which are the same ideals that they the universal ideals of humanity and liberty and democracy that the Irish people themselves have fought for.
translation.tn: Re solofela gore ba tla tla go re etela, re solofela gore ba tla nna le dikakanyo tse di akarediwang mo dipontshong tse di tshwanang le dikakanyo tse di raraaneng tse di botlhokwa tsa botho le kgololosego le temokerasi tse batho ba kwa Ireland ba di lwetseng ka bobona.

translation.en: The Irish Embassy says over 35 000 Irish citizens and many more of Irish heritage are living in South Africa.
translation.tn: Embasi ya kwa Ireland ya re, baagi kwa kwa Ireland ba feta 35 000 ka palo, le boswa jwa Ireland ba nnang mo Aforikaborwa.

translation.en: The significance of St. Patricks Day.
translation.tn: Botlhokwa jwa letsatsi la St. Patrick.

translation.en: One of the first major films to be made about COVID-19 since the outbreak of the coronavirus pandemic more than a year ago, Songbird, is on the circuit in South African cinemas.
translation.tn: Nngwe ya difilimi tse dikgolo tse di ka ga mogare wa COVID-19 fa e sale tlhagogo ya leroborobo la mogare wa corona mo ngwageng o o fetileng, Songbird, e kwa diseketeng kwa mafelong a bobogelo mo Aforikaborwa.

translation.en: The movie, directed and written by Adam Mason and with KJ Apa and Sofia Carson in the leads, is set three years into the future where attempts at a vaccine against COVID-23 have failed, the virus has mutated, and comes back stronger and deadlier.
translation.tn: Filimi eno, e e kwadilweng le go tsamaisiwa ke Adam Mason mme e eteletswe pele ke K.J. Apa le Sofia Carson, e bua ka dingwaga di le tharo mo isagweng fa maiteko a moento o o kgatlhanong le covid-23 a tlabe a reteletswe, mogare o oketsegile, mme o le bogale thata e bile o bolaya.

translation.en: Songbird tells the story of how the infected are ripped from their homes and forced into quarantine camps where they are never discharged from.
translation.tn: Songbird e re bolelela kgang ka ga mokgwa o ka ona batho ba ba tshwaetsegileng ba ntshiwang kwa magaeng a bona, ba patelediwa go ya go nna kwa dikampe tsa batho ba ba tlhaotsweng, tse ba sa tlholeng ba boela gae fa ba le kwa go tsona.

translation.en: This is as the world continues to battle against the coronavirus.
translation.tn: Se ke fa lefatshe le tswelela go lwa ntwa kgatlhanong le mogare wa corona.

translation.en: In South Africa, the number of coronavirus cases has increased to 1 532 497 with 51 634 related deaths.
translation.tn: Mo Aforikaborwa, palo ya dikgetse tsa mogare wa Corona di oketsegile go ya go 1 532 497 le dintsho di le 51 634.

translation.en: United States President Joe Biden says his rescue dog, a German Shepherd named Major, is being trained after an incident last week, but has not been banished from the White House, adding the pet is still adjusting to life there surrounded by strangers.
translation.tn: Moporesitente wa United States, Joe Biden a re ntšwa ya gagwe, modisa wa mojeremane, e e bidiwang Major, e a katisiwa morago ga tiragalo ya beke e e fetileng, mme ga e ise e lelekiwe ka pateletso kwa White House, a tlaleletsa ka gore seruiwa se santse se itlwaetsa botshelo jwa go di dikaganyediwa ke batho ba se se sa ba itseng.

translation.en: Major did not bite someone and penetrate the skin, Biden told the ABC programme Good Morning America in an interview that aired on Wednesday.
translation.tn: Major ga a loma mongwe le go tsenelela mo letlalong, Biden o boleletse lenaneo la ABC la Good Morning Amerika mo dipotsolotsong tswe di gasitsweng ka Laboraro.

translation.en: You turn the corner and there’s two people you don’t know at all and they move, and he moves to protect, Biden added, referring to US Secret Service and other staff who the German Shepherd encounters at the 18-acre (7-hectare)White House complex.
translation.tn: Fa o re o a lebelela o bona batho ba le babedi ba o sa ba itseng, mme ene tiro ya gagwre ke go sireletsa, Biden a tlaleletsa a buela mo badiring ba sephiri ba kwa US le ba bangwe ba modisa yo wa Mojerewane a kopanang le bona  kwa 18-Acre (diheketara di le7) kwa White House.

translation.en: He’s a sweet dog
translation.tn: Ke ntšwa e e bonolo.

translation.en: 85% of the people there love him.
translation.tn: Diperesente di le 58 tsa batho ba a mo rata.

translation.en: All he does is lick them and wag his tail, said Biden, who moved into the White House with his two dogs after he became president in January.
translation.tn: Se a dirang fela ke go ba latswa le go tsokotsa mogatla gagwe, go bua Biden, yo o fudugetseng kwa White House le dintšwa tsa gagwe tse pedi morago ga go nna moporesitente ka Ferikgong.

translation.en: The dog’s being trained now, I didn’t banish him to home in Delaware, Biden added.
translation.tn: Ntšwa e e a katisiwa jaanong. Ga ke a e lelekela kwa gae kwa Delaware, Biden a tlaleletsa.

translation.en: The White House last week said the dog had returned to Bidens home state while the president and first lady Jill Biden were traveling but did not directly address media reports of an incident involving security staff.
translation.tn: White House mo bekeng e e fetileng e rile, ntšwa e boetse kwa legaeng la ga Biden fa moporesitente le mme Jill Biden ba ne ba tsaya loeto, mme ga a bua le babega dikgang ka tlhamalalo ka ga tiragalo e e akaretsang badiri ba pabalesego.

translation.en: Asked if Major was now out of the dog house, Biden said: Yes.
translation.tn: Fa a bodiwa gore a Major o tswile mo ntlong ya dintšwa, Biden o rile: Ee.

translation.en: Biden adopted Major in 2018 from the Delaware Humane Society to join his other German Shepherd.
translation.tn: Biden o tsere Major ka 2018, go tswa setšhabeng se se molemo sa Delaware, gore a tle go nna le modisa wa Mojeremane.

translation.en: That dog, Champ, is already familiar with Washington life.
translation.tn: Ntšwa eo, Champ, e setse e itse botshelo jwa kwa Washington.

translation.en: Biden got Champ in 2008, the year he was elected vice president under President Barack Obama.
translation.tn: Biden o tsere Champ ka 2018, ngwaga o ka ona o neng a tlhophiwa go nna Motlatsamoporesitente ka fa tlase ga Tautona Barack Obama.
